content: Although I came back late from the party last night, I was as fresh as a daisy this morning.
translations: ita:Anche se ero tornato tardi dalla festa la scorsa notte, ero fresco come una rosa stamattina
ita:Nonostante fossi tornato tardi dalla festa la scorsa notte, ero fresco come una rosa stamattina
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by sundown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
